Jiabo Huang

Computer Vision Group
School of Electronic Engineering and Computer Science

Mile End Road
London, E1 4NS, UK
CS Room 329, Peter Landin Building
E-mail: jiabo.huang@qmul.ac.uk

Jiabo (Raymond) Huang is currently a PhD candidate within the Computer Vision Group in the School of Electronic Engineering and Computer Science at Queen Mary University of London, supervised by Prof. Shaogang (Sean) Gong.

Before joining the Computer Vision Group in QMUL, he has been worked in Intelligence Science & System Lab (ISEE) during his master's program and has been co-supervised by Prof. Wei-Shi Zheng and Research Prof. Xiao-Hua Xie. He received both his master's and bachelor's degree in Software Engineering from Sun Yat-sen University.

His research is in Computer Vision and Machine Learning, with a focus on deep learning with insufficient human supervision, including unsupervised representation learning, clustering, transfer learning, etc.
